name: Ebelskievers
ingredients: 2 tsp. sugar l1 tsp. baking soda
steps: Put ebelskiever pan on the stove over medium heat and put 1 teaspoon oil in each well. Let this heat while you make
the batter. Separate 5 eggs. Stiffly beat the whites separately. Beat 5 egg yolks together and add sugar, salt, and oil.
Add baking soda. Alternately add milk and flour while mixing to keep mixture smooth.
Fold the stiffly beaten egg whites into the mixture. Pour mixture into each well and cook until golden.
(I turn them using two wood skewers.)
